definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: She has said she believes Trump's win and the Brexit vote have helped her campaign.
sentences.chinese: 她说她相信川普的胜选和退欧公投帮助了她的竞选。

sentences.english: And it was he who loomed largest in the public mind after his historic election.
sentences.chinese: 也正是他，在其历史性的胜选之后收获民心。

sentences.english: Mr Su is unlikely to win in Taipei, a KMT stronghold.
sentences.chinese: 苏贞昌不会再国民党的大本营台北胜选。

definition: the state of play in an election/the current state of a candidate's campaign
(Tw) Emmanuel Macron (1977-), president of France from 2017
Jean-Marie Le Pen (1928-), French Front National extreme right-wing politician
Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4

definition: Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
